title: Solex Energy plans to invest Rs 8,000 crore in solar manufacturing capacity
description: Solex Energy Ltd plans to invest over Rs 8,000 crore by 2030 to enhance solar technology, increasing its cell production to 5 GW and module capacity to 15 GW. The new Tapi-R solar modules feature N-Type TOPcon technology with high efficiency, supporting India's 500 GW non-fossil fuel goal.
